Class BasicPlayLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.BasicPlayLevel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayLevel

    public class BasicPlayLevel
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayLevel
    Minimal implementation of PlayLevel interface speeds up the game as the score increases.

      • fastDropSpeed

        public int fastDropSpeed(int score)
        Description copied from interface: PlayLevel
        Time in milliseconds between frames or steps of the game when the dropping of a shape is accelerated. This value may depend on the current score.
        Specified by:
        fastDropSpeed in interface PlayLevel
        Parameters:
        score - current score for the game
        Returns:
        time in milliseconds

        Description copied from interface: PlayLevel
